The family company has been trying for years to find a partner to save its investment in the 41-story building it bought for $1.8 billion in 2006, near the top of the real-estate boom.
Recently Kushner Cos. has been losing millions of dollars a year on the building due to low occupancy and high mortgage interest payments.
Kushner Cos. had earlier talked with a member of Qatar's royal family about investing in the building at 666 5th Ave.
